name: Purge Media
description: Removes remote and local media that has accumilated on the server.

spec.question_description: What type of media you would like to purge, either local media generated on your server, or remote media synced from federating servers.
The date to purge from, must be YYYY-MM-DD format. If you're unsure what date to enter just use the approximate date your server was created. For example: 2020-06-23
The date to purge to, must be YYYY-MM-DD format. For example: 2021-03-27
